faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MIA IA SYSTEM

questions.question: What is MIA IA SYSTEM?
questions.answer: MIA is an algorithmic trading system that analyzes futures markets (ES, NQ, RTY) 24/7 and generates trading signals based on a proprietary strategy developed over 10+ years.

questions.question: Do I need trading knowledge?
questions.answer: Basic market knowledge is recommended. MIA is a decision-support tool, not a guaranteed profit system. Understanding trading risks is essential.

questions.question: How are signals generated?
questions.answer: MIA uses a proprietary strategy combining advanced technical analysis and artificial intelligence to identify the best trading opportunities.

questions.question: Is it free?
questions.answer: Yes! Access to the MIA dashboard is currently 100% free. Premium offerings with advanced features will be available soon.

questions.question: Can I lose money?
questions.answer: Yes. Trading involves risk of capital loss. Past performance does not guarantee future results. Never invest more than you can afford to lose.

questions.question: How do I access the dashboard?
questions.answer: Create a free account or sign in with Google, then click 'Access Dashboard'. You will be redirected to the MIA interface.

faq.more: Can't find the answer you're looking for?

calendar.page_subtitle: View major economic events and understand how MIA automatically protects your capital during high-impact announcements.
calendar.title: Economic Calendar
calendar.subtitle: Events impacting ES, NQ, RTY (US Futures)
calendar.critical_warning: MIA automatically blocks trading 15 min before and 30 min after these events
calendar.live_description: Check the complete economic calendar on Investing.com for real-time data.
calendar.step1_text: MIA analyzes the economic calendar every 2 hours and identifies high-impact events.
calendar.step2_text: 15 minutes before a ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê event, MIA automatically stops all new trades to protect your capital.
calendar.step3_text: 30 minutes after the announcement, once volatility has stabilized, MIA resumes trading normally.
